pull_requests.title: BIP330 code style: move import statement to top of file
pull_requests.body: Moved 'import random' from the middle of the file to the beginning to follow Python coding conventions where all imports should be placed at the top of the file after the shebang line

pull_requests.title: BIP352: remove unused import from reference.py
pull_requests.body:
Remove from itertools import permutations which is not used anywhere
Re-checked the codebase: no calls to permutations(...)

comment_list.body: In the future, will be including changes like this in the monthly batched typo-and-style cleanup.
